document_data.name: Javilarhh Snowsword I
document_data.mainbody: King '''Javilarhh "the Dark" Snowsword I''' was a [[human]] of [[Elembar]] in the early 6{{th}} century [[DR]] who became the first king of [[Delimbiyran]] and a founding monarch of [[Phalorm]].
document_data.Relationships: Javilarhh's descendant was King [[Javilarhh Snowsword II]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|511}}, the human realm of [[Elembar]] was overrun by an [[orc]]ish horde that ultimately foundered on the [[House of Stone]]. Although the capital of [[Delimbiyran (city)|Delimbiyran]] and the surrounding land survived, northern and middle Elembar was ruined and the realm was reformed as Delimbiyran with Javilarhh as the first king. In the {{YearlinkName|523}}, King Javilarhh joined King [[Ruardh Lightshiver]] of [[Ardeep]] and King [[Torghatar]] of [[Dardath]] as one of the three kings of Phalorm at the [[Council of Axe and Arrow]], joining together to mutually benefit their people.{{Cite web enhancement/Environs of Waterdeep|6}}

During the invasion of the [[Howltusk Horde]] in the {{YearlinkName|511}}, the orcs were defeated at the House of Stone, though King Javilarhh died in the battle.
